Name: Holy Road
About the game: In Holy Road, you play the role of an exiled bishop. To reobtain what was rightfully yours, you must start all over from the very beginning. You must start your kingdom, increase its population while defending your citizens, and thus increasing your wealth and power. Only by doing this will you be able to get revenge on those that wronged you. Do you have what it takes to build your kingdom from scratch? Find out for yourself in this kingdom-building simulation game! Features A Kingdom Building Simulation Experience Construct Buildings Increase your Population Defend your Citizens Amass Wealth and Power And Defeat your Enemies!
